topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/555da32f63687249f2640200#post_555da32f63687249f2640200
And now you're acting all insufferable.

You expected me to not get angry at an article that also called Gundam garbage? (I don't know which one he watched, But it obviously wasn't one made by Tomino)
topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184

topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/555da3e06368723054db0a00#post_555da3e06368723054db0a00
I never said that I hated gundam or such or that I agreed with the article's opinion; rather that the creator of gundam is kind of a fuckwit and you're getting angry at me because I showed you evidence.  Don't get angry at me for someone else's actions.

The article may have talked poorly of gundam, but I never said that I hated gundam as well.

Reason why that would be incredibly douchy:
"The creator of something I love hates something else I love" -> "I'm going to get angry at the person who linked me to evidence cause if they linked me to a article that had a negative opinion on the franchise then of course the person who linked me to it must of course hate gundam as well"


For the record I loved G Gundam and 08th ms team as a child.


To use an analogy that would be like getting upset at someone for pointing out how much of a fuckwit Joss Whedon is to Avengers fans and them getting angry at said person for Joss Whedon's individual actions.  It's like how people willingly admit that H.P. Lovecraft was a asshole, but love his books anyhow.

The creator of gundam may be a asshole, but the gundam franchise is easily one of the most iconic anime franchises.  Even in say fifty years chances are people will still remember the franchise.

Tl:dr; don't get angry at me for someone *else* hating gundam.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
